title: Harmony Foundation Base, Top if off and ph Bond - 3 PACK
description: This wonderful set of gel base coat, gel top coat and pH bond provides the basics for any style of manicure or pedicure. Harmony PH Bond is used in the preparation of the nail as a dehydrating step. This product is essential in the proper preparation of the nail plate for optimal performance. Harmony Foundation Base Gel creates the adhesive bond between the nail plate and gel products. This product secures adhesion while not damaging the natural nail plate. Foundation Gel works with Harmony's products as a base for the Soak Off Gel Polishes. Foundation cures in 10 seconds in a LED Light or 30 seconds in an UV Light. Top It Off Gel is a sealer top gel designed to create the ultimate finish with your Soak Off Polish. It creates a high shine that will not dull, chip or peel. Top It Off is a soak off product that can quickly be removed with Soak Off Gel Remover. This coat cures in 30 seconds in a LED Light or 2 minutes in a UV Light.
